metadata.title: CVE-2022-31617 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Windows contains a vulnerability in thekernel mode layer (nvlddmkm.sys), where a local user with basiccapabilities can cause an out-of-bounds read, which may lead to codeexecution, denial of service, escalation of privileges, informationdisclosure, or data tampering.

criterions.comment: nvidia-graphics-drivers-304: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
